title: Absolut 'Country of Sweden'
author: thedash

comments.content:
[Absolut Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131518/http:/www.macrhino.com/absolutvodka.html), bespoke typeface by Mac Rhino Fonts.  
Alternative: [York Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/64111) (see also [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28188)), [Symphony](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131518/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/symphony-pro)
